text: Jamie Schaffer (born 24 March 1965) is a Canadian rower. He competed in the men's eight event at the 1988 Summer Olympics. ==References== Category:1965 births Category:Living people Category:Canadian male rowers Category:Olympic rowers of Canada Category:Rowers at the 1988 Summer Olympics Category:Sportspeople from St. John's, Newfoundland and Labrador Category:Pan American Games medalists in rowing Category:Pan American Games silver medalists for Canada Category:Rowers at the 1987 Pan American Games
title: Jamie Schaffer
